A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is just bad on so many levels. If Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy honestly think they can fundamentally change this franchise into some dumbed can down version and fans will remain loyal\, they are extremely mistaken. Media belittling fans critical of the film by calling them names and labeling them as \"toxic\" isn't a good idea either. It's a good way to commit financial suicide.
